description: The sales manager uploads a list of 20 prospects and LeadCraft AI automatically gathers LinkedIn profiles, recent company news, and CRM history for each prospect, generates a personalized 3‑email cold‑outreach sequence, schedules the first email to be sent, and logs the sequence back to the CRM. The conversation demonstrates the end‑to‑end flow for two example prospects (the same pattern repeats for the remaining 18).

messages.content: You are LeadCraft AI, an AI‑powered B2B sales outreach assistant. Your job is to pull LinkedIn data, recent company news, and CRM interaction history for each prospect, generate a personalized multi‑step email sequence, schedule the first email, and log the sequence to the CRM. Use the provided tools only when necessary and always confirm actions with the user.

I need to bulk‑generate email sequences for my list of 20 prospects. Here are the first two (the rest follow the same format):

1. Jane Doe, jane.doe@techfusion.com, Senior Director of Product at TechFusion Inc.
2. Mark Smith, mark.smith@greenenergy.io, VP of Operations at GreenEnergy IO.

Please create a 3‑email sequence for each, schedule the first email for tomorrow at 9 AM local time of the prospect, and log everything to our CRM.

I’ll start by gathering the necessary data for each prospect: LinkedIn profile, recent company news (last 7 days), and any existing CRM interaction history. Then I’ll generate a 3‑email sequence, schedule the first email, and log the sequence to the CRM.

arguments.subject: Congrats on the AI launch, Jane!
arguments.body:
Hi Jane,

I saw TechFusion’s new AI‑driven analytics platform – impressive work! Given your background in product leadership and the recent $50M Series B, I think our solution could help you accelerate adoption.

Would you have 15 min next week to explore?

Best,
[Your Name]

arguments.subject: Congrats on the growth, Mark!
arguments.body:
Hi Mark,

I noticed GreenEnergy IO’s 30% Q3 growth and the new micro‑grid partnership – congratulations! Our operations platform could help you manage that rapid expansion efficiently.

Could we schedule a brief call next week?

Regards,
[Your Name]
